Title: Vishal Mahar | Personal Webpage
Name: Vishal Mahar
Description: Recent graduate from IIT Mandi. Passionate about Space Technology, Cognitive Modelling and Open Source LoL.
I grab every chance I get to mastarbuate, learn and create.
AboutContent: I’m a Civil Engineer major by day, not a Table Tennis player by evening, a functional wantrepreneur by midnight and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already cycling, off to a hike, or studying for an exam
I am not much passionate about Space Technology and Human Psychology ( never studied them formally). A die-hard fan of Rahul Vaish.
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to travel and work together whenever I can.
WorkContent: One day I will be full time Software Developer Engineer at Microsoft.

InternShips.name: Computer Vision Center, Universitat Autonoma de Barcelona

CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
